errors.error_description: The pip installation command `pip install rns --all` is incorrect. The `--all` flag does not exist for this package.
correction_candidates: Change the command to `pip install rns`
Change the command to `pip install rns --full`
Change the command to `pip install rns[all]`
Change the command to `pip install Reticulum`
errors.golden_answer: Change the command to `pip install rns`
